tool_description: Google News and Bing News Alternative. The Best API to Search News from the 2500+ Publishers Around The World.
name: News API_v2
title: News API

api_list.name: Top Headlines
api_list.description: Endpoint to find top headlines news.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: en, zh-Hans, zh-Hant, id, cs, uk, he, ar, de, es-419, ja, ko, fr, it, lv, lt, ml, th, hu, nl, no, pl, pt-419, pt-150, ro, sk, sl, sv, vi, tr, el, bg, ru, sr, mr, hi, bn, ta, te

parameters.name: category
parameters.description:
Possible options: business, science, sports, entertainment, health, technology

Default value: all categories

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: MY, GB, CN, TW, AU, BW, ET, KR, GH, IE, KE, LV, NA, IN, BD, TH, NZ, NG, PK, PH, SG, ZA, TZ, UG, ZW, ID, CZ, DE, AT, CH, AR, EG, CL, CO, CU, US, MX, PE, VE, LB, CA, FR, MA, SN, IT, LT, HK, JP, HU, BE, NL, NO, PL, BR, PT, RO, SK, SI, SE, VN, TR, GR, BG, RU, RS, UA, IL, AE, SA

utterances.utterance: Show me the top business headlines in the US.
What are the latest sports news in Australia?
Find the top technology news in Japan.
Give me the top headlines in French.
What are the latest health news in India?
Show me the top entertainment news in the UK.
Find the top science headlines in Germany.
What are the latest news in Spanish?

Find the top 5 technology news in South Korea.

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Endpoint to search news by specific keywords.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The datetime string must match ISO 8601 format

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The datetime string must match ISO 8601 format
